caption:
The photograph features a middle-aged man operating several pieces of technical equipment outside of a two-story building. The man, dressed in a white short-sleeve shirt and dark tie, is focused on his task, holding a clipboard and pen as he interacts with the machines. The equipment includes a set of gray boxes with dials and screens, possibly pertaining to air monitoring or environmental data collection.

The setting appears to be a government or institutional building as indicated by the text "STATEWIDE AIR POLLUTION RESEARCH CENTER" prominently displayed on the facade above the man. The architecture of the building includes a simple, modern design with stairs leading up to a suspended walkway on the first floor, and white railings visible above.

In the background, there is a tall, thin pine tree and lush greenery indicating a well-maintained outdoor area, possibly in a suburban or campus environment. The sky is bright and clear, suggesting a sunny day. This, along with the slightly bluish tint of the photograph, adds a vintage feel to the image, implying it might have been taken some years ago.

Overall, the composition gives the sense of a professional engaged in scientific or environmental research, highlighting a moment of focused activity within a serene setting.
title: Edgar Stephens, professor of environmental science at Statewise Air Pollution Research Center, using an optical particle counter
